mapper.select: select o.order_id, lpad(cast(o.order_number as char), 4, '0') as order_number, o.total_price, o.shipping_status, o.payment_status, o.created_at, o.name, concat_ws(' ', u.last_name_kana, u.first_name_kana) as name_kana, u.email, u.postal_code, o.address, u.phone_number from `order` o join `user` u on o.user_id = u.user_id where o.order_id = #{orderId}
select product_id, product_name, price, qty, subtotal from order_item where order_id = #{orderId} order by product_id
